docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, Aug. 13 -- Brazil suggested today that Cuba and the rest of the nations of the hemisphere could reach "a desirable general understanding on the fundamental and solid interests of all the Americas."

docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, Aug. 13 -- The United States today pledged prompt emergency aid to Latin-American nations and then reported that all significant issues of the Inter-American Economic and Social Conference had been settled.

docs.abstract: US pledges prompt emergency aid to Latin Amer nations; $150 million seen quickly available in existing foreign-aid funds for emergency projects; US reprs say more could be earmarked out of $1 billion promised in aid under Alliance programs by Mar '62; say all significant issues at conf have been settled

docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, Aug. 14 -- A declaration of democratic principles for President Kennedy's Alliance for Progress program of aid to Latin America was presented today by Peru at the Inter-American Economic and Social Conference here. Cuba was...
docs.lead_paragraph: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, Aug. 14 -- A declaration of democratic principles for President Kennedy's Alliance for Progress program of aid to Latin America was presented today by Peru at the Inter-American Economic and Social Conference here. Cuba was reported to have found it objectionable.
docs.abstract: Peru submits declaration of dem principles as summary of Alliance agreement; Guevara barred from meeting which considered declaration; later told exclusion was 'mistake'; speculation; declaration will not be part of Alliance agreement; Guevara reptdly tells Mariani that it goes beyond conf framework and is provocation against Cuba; final draft of Alliance agreement completed
